content: free pattern - f78 fino shadow shawl by fairmount fibers design team all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/22/22 © fairmount fibers ltd 2017 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit free pattern - f78 size abbreviations finished measurements approx 69 across top edge 31½ cc contrast color from center back neck to bottom point co cast on increase d increase d materials k knit manos del uruguay fino 70% extrafine merino 30% silk m marker approx 100g/490 yds 1 skip mc plus 1 miniskein set mc main color shown in 438 poison mc with kit 5 eleanor 413 rosewater pm place marker cc1 421 havisham cc2 411 pocketwatch cc3 420 repeat repeat boudoir cc4 410 garnet brooch cc5 rs right side sl slip us 6/4mm circular ndl 29 or longer or size to obtain gauge st s stitch es 2 ring markers ws wrong side yo yarnover gauge 17 sts and 32 row = 4 over stripe pattern blocked see stitch guide notes stripe pattern row 1 rs with mc k2 yo k to m yo sl m k1 sl m yo k to notes last 2 sts yo k2 4 sts incd - 17 sts and 32 row = 4 is a blocked gauge before blocking row 2 with mc knit my gauge was 24 sts and 40 row = 4 because of the silk row 3 with cc k2 yo k to m yo sl m k1 sl m yo k to last content fino relaxes quite a lot in blocking if your gauge is 2 sts yo k2 4 sts incd too big before blocking you may run out of yarn row 4 with cc k2 p to m sl m k1 sl m p to last 2 sts k2 - shawl is worked in 2-row stripes there s no need to cut repeat row 1-4 for stripe pattern yarn at every color change carry color not in use up side of work making sure not to pull it too tight all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/22/22 © fairmount fibers ltd 2017 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 3 free pattern - f78 instructions work 24 row in stripe pattern using cc4 for a total of 6 with mc co 5 stitches knit 2 row join cc1 cc4 stripes and 353 sts cut cc4 and join cc5 set up row 1 cc k2 yo pm k1 pm yo k2 7 sts work 16 row in stripe pattern using cc5 for a total of 4 set up row 2 cc k2 p1 sl m k1 sl m p1 k2 cc5 stripes and 385 sts cut cc5 work 72 row in stripe pattern see stitch guide using cc1 with mc work row 1 and 2 of stripe pattern a total of 3 for a total of 19 cc1 stripes
